content: संस्थानं {@--1@} A collection, heap, quantity. {@--2@} The aggregation of primary atoms. {@--3@} Configuration, position; आकृतिरवयवसंस्थानविशेषः. {@--4@} Form, figure, appearance, shape; स्त्रीसस्थानं चाण्सरस्तीर्थतारादुत्क्षिप्येनां ज्यीतिरिकं जगाम <ls>Ś. 5. 30</ls>; <ls>Ms. 9. 261.</ls> {@--5@} Construction, formation. {@--6@} Vicinity. {@--7@} Common place of abode. {@--8@} Situation, position. {@--9@} Any place or station. {@--10@} A place where four roads meet. {@--11@} A mark, sign, characteristic sign. {@--12@} Death.
